title: Boom Boom Blitz
body: okay so, my glove will clearly cover the person I'm trying to grab when i press q but they never get hit. Can you guys fix the animation or make it work>

replies.body:
Hey JermGettSikk,

I took a look at this one and it appears that it's using the same animation as the base. The hook appears to be grabbing/missing enemy targets properly.
maybe i jus dont know the range or something
It could be the shape of the hook (glove) throwing you off. For me, Battle Boss Blitzcrank took some getting used to.
